description: Name of the main crop produced by the household.
Would local farmer cooperatives provide support to the household in case of need?
Number of years the household has been farming this land.
Has any household member received training in the last 12 months?
How effective does the farmer perceive associations or organizations are in supporting business ventures?
Does the closest neighbor implement diversified farming systems (DFS)?
How frequently does the farmer exchange information with agricultural extensionists?
Total area of monoculture perennial crops on the farm.
Average soil pH across three locations on cropland.

factor: Support from individuals in different community
description: Would individuals from different communities (e.g., family, friends, farmers) provide support to the household in case of need?
Number of household members working seasonally in farming activities per hectare.
To what extent does the household contribute to decision-making in managing the community's land and natural resources?
How far does the farmer agree with the statement: I live in a place where most people take good care of the land and nature.
